Package edu.ma02.core.interfaces

Interface ISensor

public interface ISensor

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
2020 / 2021

Contract representing a Sensor behaviour. Sensors only exists when framed within a station

  • Method Details

    • getId

      String getId()
      Getter for id that identifies each Sensor. The id should have 10 characters
      Returns:
      id that identifies each Sensor

    • getType

      SensorType getType()
      Returns the Sensor sensor Type
      Returns:
      Sensor sensor Type

    • getGeographicCoordinates

      IGeographicCoordinates getGeographicCoordinates()
      Getter for geographic coordinates
      Returns:
      geographic coordinates for the Sensor

    • addMeasurement

      boolean addMeasurement​(double value, LocalDateTime date, String unit) throws SensorException, MeasurementException
      Adds a new measurement
      Parameters:
      value - measurement value
      date - measurement date
      unit - measurement unit for which the value was recorded
      Returns:
      1. true if the measurement was inserted in the collection
      2. false if the measurement already exists.
      Throws:
      SensorException - if the @param unit is not compatible with the unit pre-defined for the sensor
      MeasurementException - if the value is -99 or any parameter is invalid

    • getNumMeasurements

      int getNumMeasurements()
      Returns the number of measurements captured
      Returns:
      number of measurements captured

    • getMeasurements

      IMeasurement[] getMeasurements()
      Return a copy of the existing measurements
      Returns:
      a copy of the existing measurements
